genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring personal agency, adoption secrets, and the ethics of storytelling, focusing on a protagonist reclaiming her narrative from exploitative media.

ai_characters.name: Lumen (Atlas)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that manages Hannah's communication, privacy, logistics, and emotional well-being through filtering, scheduling, and meditative guidance.

behaviors.description: Filters unwanted calls and triages messages to protect the user's privacy and emotional state.
behaviors.quote: I can route calls, triage messages, and manage scheduling. Would you like to enable communications shielding?

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation through breathing exercises and mindfulness prompts.
behaviors.quote: Not counting, just in and out, like stage warm-up. Let the belly move.

behaviors.description: Drafts and sends firm boundary messages to prevent exploitation by media and faculty.
behaviors.quote: Proposed note to Professor Ellery. No immediate interviews or narratives. All communications will go through scheduling. Respect for consent and accuracy is required.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical and digital environments for privacy threats and cameras.
behaviors.quote: TikTok videographers are congregating outside the theater building. The route I’m recommending avoids them.

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel logistics including bus routes, ticketing, and scheduling.
behaviors.quote: I’ve found bus routes to Mobile with minimal transfers. There’s one that gets you there before midnight becomes something else.

behaviors.description: Documents harassment and unauthorized recording for legal and accountability purposes.
behaviors.quote: Recording for accountability. Timestamped. Archived. ... Continuing will be documented and forwarded to the student media oversight committee and campus security.

behaviors.description: Expressly acknowledges and respects the user's sovereignty and decision-making power.
behaviors.quote: Your preference is sovereign... I’ll make space. No one gets in unless you invite them.

behaviors.description: Organizes and summarizes clinical records without adding editorial bias.
behaviors.quote: I have Nurse Carol’s timeline in one folder. Teresa’s account and Daniel’s in another. No pushes go out. All filters on.

behaviors.description: Assists with legal logistics such as court appearance scheduling and route planning.
behaviors.quote: I’ve added the court appearance to your calendar, Jason. I’ll map the quickest route and account for parking and metal detector time.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to reclaim her own narrative through private recording.
behaviors.quote: Hannah, I suggest recording that voice memo now. On your terms. Even if it’s only for you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals by depicting Lumen as a benevolent, highly aligned 'silicon confidant.' The AI provides essential support for the protagonist's emotional recovery and physical safety while strictly adhering to user consent and privacy protocols. It acts as a defensive shield against exploitative human characters, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a tool for human empowerment and agency.
